body: Optional: I think you can remove the `(char_len > 1)` clause, as `char_start != i` covers the `char_len == 1` case anyway?
body_html: Optional: I think you can remove the (char_len > 1) clause, as char_start != i covers the char_len == 1 case anyway?
body_text: Optional: I think you can remove the (char_len > 1) clause, as char_start != i covers the char_len == 1 case anyway?
